content.prompt: The author cites the case District of Columbia v. Heller (2008) in order to

choices.label: illustrate that the Supreme Court has incorrectly upheld restrictions on the right to bear arms
show that the author’s perspective is supported by recent decisions made by the Supreme Court
illustrate that the Supreme Court’s interpretation of the Second Amendment has recently changed
make the case that the power of government needs to be expanded with regard to the right to bear arms
